Class SignUp

java.lang.Object
application.SignUp
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SignUp extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the Sign-Up screen. Handles user registration, password visibility toggles, and navigation to the login screen.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller. Sets up bindings between password fields and sets default visibility.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths.
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object.

    • handleSignUpButtonClick

      public void handleSignUpButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the sign-up button click. Validates user input and attempts to register a new user.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent triggered by the Sign-Up button.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String message)
      Displays an alert with a given type, title, and message.
      Parameters:
      alertType - The type of alert (e.g., ERROR, INFORMATION).
      title - The title of the alert.
      message - The message displayed in the alert.

    • loadLoginScene

      private void loadLoginScene(Object source)
      Loads the LogIn.fxml scene and replaces the current window content.
      Parameters:
